cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 5 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Travelling in a couple or donâ€™t mind sharing with a friend? Our private double rooms are perfect for those who like their own space.

Linen and towels are provided and guests have access to a bathroom which may be shared by up to 2 other rooms.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
This is our private room with 2 single beds in bunk form. Linen and towels are provided.

This room has access to a bathroom, which may be shared with up to two other rooms. There is also a communal lounge and kitchen with fridge and freezer.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
